alert.note: Alert for Maricopa; Yuma (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued December 22 at 5:40PM MST until December 22 at 6:00PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 600 PM MST FOR NORTHEASTERN YUMA AND MARICOPA COUNTIES... At 540 PM MST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 7 miles south of Sundad to 8 miles northeast of Sentinel to 20 miles southwest of Gila Bend Auxiliary Field to 12 miles northwest of Ajo, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Gila Bend, Gila Bend Auxiliary Field, Sentinel, and Hyder. This includes the following highways... AZ Interstate 8 between mile markers 86 and 123. AZ Route 238 between mile markers 1 and 3. AZ Route 85 between mile markers 1 and 125. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
